translation.en: - ♪ Spins madly on ♪ - Oh, great.
Well, that looks like a nasty bump.
- How do you feel? - Not great.
translation.fr: - Comment tu te sens ? - Pas terrible.

translation.en: I'm not surprised.
Word to the wise.
That particular patient always requires restraints.
translation.fr: Ce patient doit toujours être attaché.

translation.en: Right. There wasn't a chart.
translation.fr: Il n'y avait pas de dossier médical.

translation.en: It's your first day, huh?
- Yeah. - Always get the chart.
- Okay? - Yeah.
Don't wanna walk into a situation totally blind.
translation.fr: Il faut savoir où on met les pieds.

translation.en: - You'll wind up-- - Knocked on my ass?
translation.fr: - Sinon, tu finiras... - Sur le cul ?

translation.en: Yeah.
Have a good day.
- Oh! - You need to get out of the car.
- What? - You need to get out of the car, ma'am.
translation.fr: - Sortez de la voiture. - Quoi ? Sortez de la voiture, madame. Elle est coincée dans le fossé.

translation.en: - Your vehicle is stuck in the ditch. - What?
translation.fr: Sortez de la voiture, madame. Elle est coincée dans le fossé. Quoi ?

translation.en: Oh, it's unbelievable.
Well, you're lucky you didn't smash this ridiculous little car into a tree.
translation.fr: Vous avez de la chance de ne pas avoir foncé dans un arbre.

translation.en: Thank you for stopping. I'll just call AAA.
translation.fr: Merci de vous être arrêté. J'appelle la dépanneuse.

translation.en: Uh... Look around.
You're in a heavily wooded area. There's no cell reception here.
translation.fr: C'est une zone densément boisée. Il n'y a pas de réseau ici.

translation.en: Damn it.
I'll call Bert once we get into town.
translation.fr: J'appellerai Bert quand on sera en ville.

translation.en: If he's not too busy, maybe you'll get your car back this week.
translation.fr: S'il n'est pas trop occupé, vous récupérerez la voiture cette semaine.

translation.en: Are you comin' or not?
Um... Could you drop me at the McCrea cabin?
translation.fr: Vous pourriez me déposer au chalet McCrea ?

translation.en: It's in Virgin River. I've got the address here.
translation.fr: C'est à Virgin River. J'ai l'adresse.

translation.en: Anyone who lives within 50 miles of here knows the McCrea cabin.
translation.fr: Quiconque habite dans un rayon de 80 km connaît le chalet McCrea.

translation.en: Oh. Well, from the photo, it's beautiful.
translation.fr: D'après la photo, il est magnifique.

translation.en: Here.
Folks around here, we don't pay each other to be neighborly.
translation.fr: Les gens d'ici ne se payent pas pour s'entraider.

translation.en: Just somethin' we do.
Right. I'm sorry.
Thank you.
And here we are.
Oh, no.
That's a beaut, huh?
Oh! Someone pulled a fast one on you.
Never book your vacation online, they'll scam you every time.
translation.fr: Ne réservez jamais vos vacances en ligne, c'est l'arnaque assurée.

translation.en: No, I-- I'm not on vacation. I'm here for a job.
translation.fr: Je ne suis pas en vacances. Je viens travailler.

translation.en: I'm the new nurse.
I'm-- I'm actually a nurse practitioner and midwife.
I'm gonna be working with Dr. Mullins.
translation.fr: Je vais travailler avec le Dr Mullins.

translation.en: I heard he's handling the practice alone, and it's getting to be too much for him.
translation.fr: On m'a dit qu'il gère le cabinet seul et que ça devient trop pour lui.

translation.en: Oh, is-- is that what you heard, huh?
translation.fr: On vous a dit ça, hein ?

translation.en: - Okay. - Yeah. I think he's in his 70s and still working full time.
translation.fr: Oui. Il travaillerait à plein temps à 70 ans passés.

translation.en: Oh, it's a wonder he's still above ground.
translation.fr: Étonnant qu'il soit encore en vie.

translation.en: So, old Doc hired ya, huh?
translation.fr: Alors le vieux Doc vous a engagée.

translation.en: Well, Hope McCrea did the actual hiring.
I'm so sorry. I don't know your name.
translation.fr: Désolée. Je ne connais pas votre nom.

translation.en: I'm Melinda Monroe. People call me Mel.
translation.fr: Je suis Melinda Monroe. On m'appelle Mel.

translation.en: I'm Vernon.
People call me Doc Mullins.
And for the record, missy,
Oh. Oh, what is that?
- Hello? - Hello?
Hi.
Melinda!
I'm Hope McCrea.
As the mayor of Virgin River,
translation.fr: En tant que maire de Virgin River,

translation.en: I'd like to officially welcome you to our little slice of heaven.
translation.fr: je vous souhaite la bienvenue dans notre petit coin de paradis.

translation.en: Hi, Hope. I'm sorry. I'm sorry. I just--
I'm a little confused.
This is what you sent me.
translation.fr: C'est ce que vous m'avez envoyé.

translation.en: The-- This farmhouse- chic cabin...
translation.fr: Ce grand chalet rustique et chic...

translation.en: nestled in the woods of Northern California
translation.fr: niché dans les bois du nord de la Californie

translation.en: is designed to enjoy all the trappings of country life?
translation.fr: est conçu pour profiter des joies de la vie à la campagne ?

translation.en: Like-- Farmhouse- chic is not an accurate description of this property.
translation.fr: Rustique et chic ne décrit pas vraiment cette propriété.

translation.en: I admit, I-- I haven't gotten around to taking a more current photo.
translation.fr: J'admets que j'aurais pu prendre une photo plus récente.

translation.en: Okay, well, the job I accepted included housing for a year.
translation.fr: Le poste que j'ai accepté inclut le logis pendant un an.

translation.en: - And I obviously can't stay here. - Um...
translation.fr: Et je ne peux clairement pas vivre ici.

translation.en: I'll have it cleaned.
Was that-- Did you just put a bird's-- Is that a bird's nest from the oven?
translation.fr: Vous venez de sortir un nid d'oiseau du four ?

translation.en: You did come a bit early.
No, I didn't. I'm three days late.
translation.fr: Non. J'ai trois jours de retard.

translation.en: Well, no need to get all twisted up.
translation.fr: Pas la peine de vous énerver.

translation.en: - Well... - I can wake up the Fitches.
Jo Ellen and Nick rent out their extra rooms.
translation.fr: Jo Ellen et Nick louent des chambres.

translation.en: Of course, the husband's a bit handsy.
translation.fr: Mais le mari a les mains baladeuses.

translation.en: He pretends it's an accident, but it isn't.
translation.fr: Il fait semblant de ne pas le faire exprès.

translation.en: Um... Anyway, you look like you can take care of yourself.
translation.fr: Mais vous avez l'air de pouvoir vous débrouiller.

translation.en: Oh, well, at least the fridge is stocked with gourmet foods and beverages.
translation.fr: Au moins, le frigo est rempli de nourriture gastronomique.

translation.en: I was going to take care of that earlier,
but we... we had a ribbon cutting ceremony over at the firehouse.
translation.fr: mais j'avais une cérémonie d'inauguration à la caserne des pompiers.

translation.en: Got ourselves a new hose.
- When did you eat last? - Why?
translation.fr: - Vous avez mangé il y a longtemps ? - Pourquoi ?

translation.en: Hungry equals cranky.
And between us gals, you don't wear cranky well.
translation.fr: Et entre nous, être grincheuse ne vous va pas.

translation.en: - Hm. - Head to Jack's. By the time you get back,
translation.fr: Allez Chez Jack, quand vous reviendrez,

translation.en: I'll have the hot water running and fresh towels and blankets.
translation.fr: il y aura l'eau chaude et des serviettes et couvertures propres.

translation.en: - Who's Jack? I-- - Jack's Bar.
translation.fr: - Qui est Jack ? - Il tient un bar.

translation.en: Only place to eat in town after five. You can walk. Out the door and to the left.
translation.fr: Le seul endroit pour manger après 17 h. Allez-y à pied. Partez vers la gauche.

translation.en: Okay, but we're not done talking about this.
Of course we aren't.
Bye.
♪ You're bringin' trouble ♪ ♪ You keep me hangin' ♪
- Ricky. - Yeah?
More glasses, please.
Uh, sure, boss.
So, what are we havin'?
Whiskey? Soda? Wine?
translation.fr: Un whisky ? Un soda ? Du vin ?

translation.en: You look like a wine person.
You need a minute?
Uh, no. Uh, any chance of getting a cosmo?
translation.fr: Non. Je peux avoir un Cosmo ?

translation.en: Nope. Not unless you brought your own Cointreau.
translation.fr: Non. À moins que n'apportiez du Cointreau.

translation.en: I did not.
Uh... So, mixed drinks are not...
Not our thing.
But I have all the boys, Johnnie, Jack, and Jim.
translation.fr: Mais Johnnie, Jack et Jim sont là.

translation.en: All the regular stuff and beer. Just no frills.
translation.fr: Bière et boissons normales. Rien de superflu.

translation.en: All right, make it a Jim straight up. Okay.
translation.fr: - Bon, alors un Jim sec. - D'accord.

translation.en: I commend you on your choice.
- Thank you. - Mm- hm.
Well, I didn't know city girls could shoot whiskey.
translation.fr: Alors les citadines boivent le whisky cul-sec.

translation.en: What makes you think I'm a city girl?
Come on. Cosmo?
Manicure? Cartier?
Wow. You should be a detective.
No. My days of tracking bad guys are over.
translation.fr: Non. Traquer les méchants, c'est fini pour moi.

translation.en: - What? - Sorry.
translation.fr: Quoi ? Désolé. On n'a pas beaucoup de visites par ici.

translation.en: We don't get a lot of visitors. Certainly not as beautiful as you.
translation.fr: Désolé. On n'a pas beaucoup de visites par ici. Surtout aussi belles que vous.

translation.en: I'm sorry. Does that line really work?
Oh, you'd be surprised.
Well, you're lucky we're not in Los Angeles,
translation.fr: Parce qu'on n'est pas à Los Angeles,

translation.en: because Angelinos can smell BS a mile away.
translation.fr: car là-bas, on sent le baratin à un kilomètre.

translation.en: Oh, really? That's one of the reasons why I love living here so much.
translation.fr: Vraiment ? C'est pour ça que j'aime tant vivre ici.

translation.en: - People aren't so jaded. -
I'm Jack Sheridan.
So, is this your bar?
Well, it will be in about 60 more payments.
So, Miss Mel Monroe from LA,
translation.fr: Alors, Mlle Mel Monroe de Los Angeles,

translation.en: what brings you to our tiny little hamlet?
translation.fr: qu'est-ce qui vous amène dans notre petit hameau ?

translation.en: - Work. - Yeah?
Where you staying?
Uh, the McCrea cabin.
Oof. What'd you do to deserve that?
Yeah, I should have come up and vetted the place first.
translation.fr: Oui, j'aurais d'abord dû venir en reconnaissance.

translation.en: Oh, come on.
I think spontaneity's an admirable quality.
translation.fr: La spontanéité est une qualité admirable.

translation.en: Oh, no. You-- you can't credit me with being spontaneous.
translation.fr: Non, on ne peut pas dire que je sois spontannée.

translation.en: No, it once took me six months to buy a crêpe pan.
translation.fr: Ça m'a pris six mois pour acheter une poêle à crêpe.

translation.en: - Six months. - Six months.
Yeah, I usually check everything three times, and then I check it again.
translation.fr: D'habitude, je vérifie tout trois fois, puis je revérifie.

translation.en: Used to drive my...
- So, how long you here for? - Um...
A year.
I'm working with Dr. Mullins.
translation.fr: Je travaille avec le Dr Mullins.

translation.en: I'm a nurse.
Oh, that should be an experience.
Yeah. I imagine it's gonna resemble the cabin.
translation.fr: Oui. J'imagine que ça ressemblera au chalet.

translation.en: - Uncomfortable. - Exactly.
I think you might be right.
So, you know Dr. Mullins?
translation.fr: Alors tu connais le Dr Mullins ?

translation.en: Oh, everybody knows everybody around here.
translation.fr: Tout le monde se connaît par ici.

translation.en: - Small town. - Right.
And it's Doc.
He does not like formalities.
Oh, well, he does not like me.
translation.fr: Il ne m'aime pas non plus.

translation.en: I basically called him old.
But in my defense,
I didn't know it was him I was talking to when I said it.
translation.fr: je ne savais pas qui il était en lui parlant.

translation.en: - He is old. - I know, right?
Thank you.
- Mel, Preacher. - Hi.
Yeah, he's a man of few words, but he's a good friend,
translation.fr: Un homme de peu de mots, mais c'est un bon ami et un super cuisinier.

translation.en: - and he's a great cook. - Mm.
translation.fr: mais c'est un bon ami et un super cuisinier.

translation.en: This is amazing. What is this?
Squirrel.
- That was too easy. - That's not funny.
translation.fr: - Trop facile. - Ce n'est pas drôle.

translation.en: You're dining on squash and lentils.
translation.fr: C'est de la courge et des lentilles.

translation.en: You know what? I actually have had squirrel,
translation.fr: Mais j'ai déjà mangé de l'écureuil

translation.en: and if it's done right, it's pretty tasty.
translation.fr: et bien préparé, c'est plutôt bon.

translation.en: Okay, well, I'm gonna take your word on that.
Oh, no, no, no.
If I have any more, I won't be able to find the cabin.
translation.fr: Si j'en reprend un, je ne retrouverai pas le chalet.

translation.en: Which might not be a bad thing, so...
translation.fr: C'est peut-être une bonne chose, alors...

translation.en: It's my car. God bless you, Bert.
translation.fr: C'est ma voiture. Dieu bénisse Bert.

translation.en: I can't sleep in that.
translation.fr: Je ne peux pas dormir là-dedans.

translation.en: You certainly can't drive.
translation.fr: Tu ne peux pas conduire, en tout cas.

translation.en: Oh, no, no, no.
No. I mean, leaving town's just not even an option.
translation.fr: Non. Quitter la ville n'est pas envisageable.

translation.en: Would you like to know why?
I will tell you.
Because... I sold my house...
translation.fr: Parce que... j'ai vendu ma maison...

translation.en: and most of my belongings. And then I quit my job.
translation.fr: et le gros de mes affaires. Puis j'ai démissionné.

translation.en: And I moved to this town that I've never heard of just so I could live in there.
translation.fr: Et j'ai emménagé dans cette ville inconnue pour atterrir là-dedans.

translation.en: - Yep. - So...
I hate it when Joey's right.
translation.fr: J'ai horreur que Joey ait raison.

translation.en: You know?
Husband?
Sister.
- Yeah. - Well...
if I had a spare room, I'd offer, but...
translation.fr: Si j'avais une chambre de libre, je te l'offrirais...

translation.en: Oh, no, no, no. That's sweet, but it's... it's fine.
translation.fr: Non. C'est gentil, mais ça ira.

translation.en: I'll just, you know, it'll be one night.
It'll be like camping. Right?
translation.fr: Ce sera comme camper. Pas vrai ?

translation.en: Yeah, sure.
It's not that bad, right?
Well...
Perspective is most often the key to happiness.
translation.fr: La perspective est souvent la clé du bonheur.

translation.en: So, what you're saying is that acclimation is possible.
translation.fr: Tu veux dire que je peux m'acclimater.

translation.en: Oh, yeah.
Just try not to insult any more residents.
translation.fr: Essaie de ne pas insulter d'autres habitants.

translation.en: Thank you, Jack.
Thank you for the... the help, and the kind words, and food.
translation.fr: Merci pour l'aide, les mots gentils et le dîner.

translation.en: But mostly, thank you for the whiskey.
translation.fr: Mais surtout, merci pour le whisky.

translation.en: Any time, Mel.
Hey, Mark, do you know which box the towels are in?
translation.fr: Mark, tu sais dans quel carton sont les serviettes ?

translation.en: but I found a set of sheets.
What are you doing with this?
translation.fr: Qu'est-ce que tu fais avec ça ?

translation.en: I'm drying my hands.
This is personally autographed by Bob Seger
and the entire Silver Bullet Band.
translation.fr: avec le Silver Bullet Band au complet.

translation.en: Handed down to me by my father, who was at Cobo Hall in Detroit
translation.fr: Il m'a été transmis par mon père qui était au Cobo Hall à Détroit

translation.en: on the night of the live recording of their very first album.
translation.fr: le soir de l'enregistrement de leur tout premier album.

translation.en: Now, one beautiful day in the not- too- distant future,
translation.fr: Un beau jour, dans un avenir pas trop lointain,

translation.en: I'm gonna hand this on to our son, Mark Junior.
translation.fr: je le transmettrai à notre fils, Mark Jr.

translation.en: - Mm. - And he to his son, Mark Junior Junior. And so on and so forth.
translation.fr: Il le transmettra à son fils, Mark Jr. Jr. Et ainsi de suite.

translation.en: What if we have a girl?
translation.fr: Et si on avait une fille ?

translation.en: What if we have a girl?
translation.fr: Et si on avait une fille ?

translation.en: Come on!
I hate this place.
It's too early for lectures.
Hey, I didn't say a thing.
Yeah, you didn't have to.
translation.fr: Tu n'as pas eu à le faire.

translation.en: So?
The pretty lady make it home last night?
translation.fr: La jolie dame est bien rentrée hier ?

translation.en: She had a ring on.
Yeah, I wasn't sure you noticed.
I did.
That gun's not loaded, right?
translation.fr: Le fusil n'est pas chargé, si ?

translation.en: Okay. Uh, first, I just wanted to say thank you for stopping and helping me last night.
translation.fr: Bon. D'abord, je voulais vous remercier de vous être arrêté pour m'aider hier.

translation.en: And second, I would like to apologize for what I said.
translation.fr: Ensuite, je voudrais m'excuser pour ce que j'ai dit.

translation.en: The part where you called me old
or the part where you said I can't handle my practice?
translation.fr: ou avoir dit que le cabinet était trop pour moi ?

translation.en: In my defense, I was told by Mrs. McCrea that you were elderly
translation.fr: Pour ma défense, Mme McCrae m'a dit que vous étiez âgé et bientôt à la retraite.

translation.en: - and nearing retirement. -
translation.fr: que vous étiez âgé et bientôt à la retraite.

translation.en: It took me 30 years to build this practice from scratch.
translation.fr: Il m'a fallu 30 ans pour le bâtir. À partir de rien.

translation.en: No help.
No nurse. I don't need ya.
translation.fr: Sans infirmière. Pas besoin de vous.

translation.en: Well, I signed a contract.
Hah. Not with me, you didn't.
I don't even recall interviewing you, but maybe that's... that's just my dementia actin' up.
translation.fr: Je ne me rappelle pas notre entretien, mais je dois être sénile.

translation.en: Well, I was hired to do a job, and I'm here to do that job.
translation.fr: J'ai été engagée pour un travail et je suis là pour le faire.

translation.en: You know, in this county, trespassers can be shot...
translation.fr: Dans ce comté, les intrus peuvent être abattus...

translation.en: on sight.
Uh, I'm not trespassing.
translation.fr: Je ne suis pas une intruse.

translation.en: Do you work here? No.
Are you a patient here? No.
Did I invite you in? No.
translation.fr: Je vous ai invitée à entrer ? Non.

translation.en: If it looks like a duck and quacks like a duck,
translation.fr: Si ça ressemble à un canard et que ça fait coin-coin,

translation.en: that is a duck.
Okay. What are you gonna do, shoot me?
translation.fr: Et vous allez faire quoi, m'abattre ?

translation.en: Well, it's finally happened.
- You've lost your damn mind. - Ow.
You threatened her with a gun?
translation.fr: Tu l'as menacée avec une arme ?

translation.en: I simply educated her
translation.fr: Je l'ai juste informée sur certaines de nos lois locales.

translation.en: - on some of our local laws. - You are a stubborn goat.
translation.fr: Je l'ai juste informée sur certaines de nos lois locales. Tu es têtu comme une mule.

translation.en: I think you mean stubborn old goat.
translation.fr: Tu veux dire têtu comme une vieille mule.

translation.en: You're old. I'm old. It's not a secret.
translation.fr: Tu es vieux. Moi aussi. Et alors ?

translation.en: - I told you I would find somebody myself. - Maybe I should just go--
translation.fr: - Je t'ai dit que je trouverais quelqu'un. - Je vais y aller...

translation.en: - Go! - Stay!
I gave you an entire year.
translation.fr: Je t'ai donné une année entière.

translation.en: This is not your business.
- This town depends on both of us. - And who put you in charge?
translation.fr: - La ville dépend de nous deux. - Et qui t'a désignée chef ?

translation.en: The town did when they elected me mayor.
translation.fr: Les habitants qui m'ont élue maire.

translation.en: - You ran unopposed. - The point is, I won.
translation.fr: Sans adversaire. Le fait est que j'ai gagné.

translation.en: You are the only one who thinks I need any help.
translation.fr: Toi seule pense que j'ai besoin d'aide.

translation.en: - The only one. - Bull.
Everyone thinks you need help. They're just too scared to tell you.
translation.fr: Tout le monde le pense. Ils ont trop peur de te le dire.

translation.en: Vernon, we both know you can't be in two places at once.
translation.fr: On sait tous deux que tu ne peux pas être à deux endroits à la fois.

translation.en: Even for you, that was low.
translation.fr: Même venant de toi, c'était bas.

translation.en: I thought you were dead.
Hey, I'm sorry, sis. I--
Yeah, I was about to call out the National Guard.
Well, they probably wouldn't be able to find this place, anyway.
translation.fr: Ils ne trouveraient même pas cet endroit.

translation.en: What's wrong?
Nothing. I'm fi-- I'm fine.
I'm worried about you. Just tell me what's goin' on.
translation.fr: Je m'inquiète pour toi. Dis-moi ce qui se passe.

translation.en: Um, nothing.
Nothing, nothing. I'm... fine.
I just...
It's just this doctor that I'm working for doesn't want me here.
translation.fr: Le docteur pour qui je travaille ne veut pas de moi ici.

translation.en: And this cabin I'm in, it's just...
it's just awful.
And I...
I just feel really alone right now.
Mel, you are not alone.
Okay? Come back here.
You can stay with us for as long as you want.
translation.fr: Tu peux rester chez nous tant que tu veux.

translation.en: Mel, stop trying to punish yourself for what happened.
translation.fr: Mel, arrête de te punir pour ce qui s'est passé.

translation.en: Nobody blames you.
Just come home.
Honey, all you changed by moving was your address.
translation.fr: Déménager n'a changé que ton adresse.

translation.en: I'm sorry, Joe. I'm gonna call you tomorrow, okay?
translation.fr: Désolée, Joe. Je t'appelle demain, d'accord ?

translation.en: - I love you. - No.
Hey.
I've got goat, beef, venison, rabbit, and buffalo.
translation.fr: J'ai de la chèvre, du bœuf, du chevreuil , du lapin et du bison.

translation.en: Uh... Any fish?
You know, you should try the salad with the shaved brussels sprouts and kale.
translation.fr: Essaie la salade de choux de Bruxelles et chou frisé.

translation.en: - Kale? - Yeah.
All of Preacher's vegetables are farm- to- table,
translation.fr: Les légumes de Preacher viennent directement

translation.en: and the farm is about 50 feet from the table.
Okay, great. Well, I'll have that salad, please.
translation.fr: Super. Je vais prendre cette salade.

translation.en: - Thanks for the assist. - I'm Paige Lassiter.
translation.fr: - Merci pour l'aide. - Je suis Paige Lassiter.

translation.en: I run the bakery truck.
- Hi. I'm Mel-- - Monroe. Yeah, the new nurse.
translation.fr: - Salut. Je suis Mel... - Monroe. La nouvelle infirmière.

translation.en: In small towns, the internet is slow, but the gossip is fast.
translation.fr: Dans une petite ville, Internet est lent, mais les ragots vont vite.

translation.en: Right.
Is that a Celine bag?
Yes, it is.
I'm probably the only person in Virgin River with a subscription to Vogue.
translation.fr: Je dois être la seule abonnée à Vogue de Virgin River.

translation.en: - So, this... -
Um... Anyway, you should stop by for a muffin or something.
translation.fr: Bref, tu devrais passer prendre un muffin ou autre.

translation.en: - Oh? - Yeah. Us girls should stick together.
Absolutely.
- Okay. It's nice to meet you. - You too.
translation.fr: - Bon. Ravie de te connaître. - Moi aussi.

translation.en: Look...
- you are a brilliant doctor... - Huh.
But when you're finally ready to hang up your stethoscope,
translation.fr: mais quand tu seras prêt à raccrocher ton stéthoscope,

translation.en: you'll be leaving behind a gaping hole in this community.
translation.fr: tu laisseras un trou béant dans cette communauté.

translation.en: I don't even know her.
translation.fr: Je ne la connais même pas.

translation.en: She ranked top of her class at UC Irvine,
translation.fr: Elle était première de sa classe à l'université,

translation.en: did her practical at County USC,
translation.fr: elle a fait son stage au County USC,

translation.en: then she spent five years working emergency at Cedars- Sinai.
translation.fr: avant de travailler cinq ans aux urgences de Cedars Sinai.

translation.en: Her references are good as gold.
translation.fr: Elle a des références en béton.

translation.en: Then what the heck's she doin' here?
I guess she... wanted a change.
translation.fr: J'imagine qu'elle avait besoin de changement.

translation.en: Even if you're too stubborn to admit it, we both know you need help.
translation.fr: Tu es trop têtu pour l'admettre, mais tu sais que tu as besoin d'aide.

translation.en: Give her a chance.
You got nothing to lose.
Thirty days.
But... if she can't cut it,
translation.fr: Mais si elle ne fait pas l'affaire,

translation.en: I've got your word this is the last time you stick your nose in my business.
translation.fr: c'est la dernière fois que tu mets ton nez dans mes affaires.

translation.en: Ooh. Good choice.
This is so delicious.
Well, you sound surprised.
Oh, no, it's totally normal to have a gourmet kale and brussels sprout salad
translation.fr: Non, c'est normal de manger une salade de choux de Bruxelles et chou frisé

translation.en: at a bar in the middle of nowhere surrounded by animal heads.
translation.fr: dans un bar paumé et décoré de têtes d'animaux.

translation.en: You want something to drink?
I would kill for a latte.
Sorry. Nearest Starbucks, 80 miles away.
translation.fr: Le prochain Starbucks est à 130 km.

translation.en: - Really? - Mm- hm.
You know there's a Starbucks in Kuala Lumpur?
translation.fr: Il y a un Starbucks à Kuala Lumpur.

translation.en: Um, Nurses Beyond Borders.
A humanitarian.
There's so many things to learn about you, huh?
translation.fr: Il y a tant de choses à apprendre sur toi.

translation.en: Hm. Yeah, well, according to Doc, I'm an ageist.
translation.fr: D'après Doc, je discrimine les vieux.

translation.en: Well, good thing I'm still relatively young and attractive.
translation.fr: Heureusement que je suis encore assez jeune et beau.

translation.en: You know, looks have nothing to do with it.
translation.fr: Ton apparence n'a rien à voir.

translation.en: You're the only restaurant in town.
translation.fr: Tu es le seul restaurant ici.

translation.en: Oh, yeah, you keep telling yourself that.
translation.fr: Continue à te raconter des histoires.

translation.en: What I keep telling myself is that I'm crazy
translation.fr: Ce que je me raconte, c'est que je suis dingue

translation.en: for not packing up and going home.
translation.fr: de ne pas faire mes valises.

translation.en: Good news.
Doc's not gonna throw you a parade, but he agreed to try you out.
translation.fr: Doc n'est pas enthousiaste, mais il vous met à l'essai.

translation.en: You start immediately.
Hope, you've already hired me.
Well, here's the thing.
I'm paying your salary, but it is his practice, so...
translation.fr: Je paie votre salaire, mais c'est son cabinet. Donc...

translation.en: Why didn't you just tell me that?
translation.fr: Vous auriez pu me le dire.

translation.en: Honey, then you wouldn't have come, would you?
Like my father said to my mother at the altar, You're already here, so let's make the best of it.
translation.fr: Comme a dit mon père à ma mère à l'autel, puisque tu es là, tirons-en le meilleur.

translation.en: Well, I'm not staying in that shack another night.
translation.fr: Je ne passerai pas une autre nuit dans la cabane.

translation.en: I gotta side with Mel on that one.
translation.fr: Mel a raison sur ce coup-là.

translation.en: You stay out of this.
Do I need to remind you that we have a--
Oh, oh, I'm fully aware that we have a contract.
translation.fr: Je sais qu'on a un signé un contrat.

translation.en: Okay? I'm also aware that suitable housing was part of the deal,
translation.fr: Je sais aussi qu'un logement convenable faisait partie de l'accord,

translation.en: so technically, you're in breach.
Which means the contract is null and void. I can leave whenever I want.
translation.fr: Donc le contrat est nul et non avenu et je peux partir quand je veux.

translation.en: - - Can you afford to have her leave?
translation.fr: Tu peux te permettre de la laisser partir ?

translation.en: No.
Well, why don't you get her a room at the Fitches'?
translation.fr: Donne-lui une chambre chez les Fitch.

translation.en: I'll fix up the cabin. Ricky could help me.
translation.fr: Je réparerai le chalet. Ricky peut m'aider.

translation.en: I'm not made of money.
translation.fr: Je ne roule pas sur l'or.

translation.en: Hope, please don't poor- mouth to me.
translation.fr: Hope, ne fais pas ta pauvre.

translation.en: You and I both know you couldn't spend half of what you have if you tried.
translation.fr: Tu ne pourrais pas dépenser la moitié de ton argent si tu le voulais.

translation.en: You're offering an awful lot of yourself to help a complete stranger.
translation.fr: Tu donnes beaucoup de toi-même pour aider une parfaite étrangère.

translation.en: Oh, Hope, I thought you knew me better than that.
translation.fr: Je croyais que tu me connaissais mieux que ça.

translation.en: Jack, I've known you a long time.
translation.fr: Jack, je te connais depuis longtemps.

translation.en: If Mel was short for Melvin, we wouldn't be having this conversation.
translation.fr: Si Mel était le diminutif de Melvin, on n'aurait pas cette conversation.

translation.en: I believe Hope has some good news for you.
translation.fr: Hope a une bonne nouvelle pour toi.

translation.en: I'll put you up at the Fitches' while I figure out what to do with the cabin.
translation.fr: Vous logerez chez les Fitch le temps de régler la question du chalet.

translation.en: The place with the handsy husband?
translation.fr: Avec le mari aux mains baladeuses ?

translation.en: Did I say that?
You know, I can fight my own battles.
translation.fr: Tu sais, je sais me défendre.

translation.en: Never turn down help when deep in a foxhole.
translation.fr: Ne jamais refuser d'aide quand on est au fond du trou.

translation.en: How about a show of Virgin River hospitality?
translation.fr: Et si je te montrais l'hospitalité de Virgin River ?

translation.en: Why don't I take you on a tour tomorrow?
translation.fr: Je peux te faire visiter demain.

translation.en: Okay, tell you what.
I'm gonna be at the river at seven a.m.
translation.fr: Je serai à la rivière à 7 h du matin.

translation.en: If you want to join me,
translation.fr: Si tu veux te joindre à moi,

translation.en: I'll be there.
Hey. Uh, so, should I just pull up a chart and grab a patient?
translation.fr: Salut. Je prends un dossier et un patient ?

translation.en: - No. - No?
No. Until I can confirm that you are competent, no patients.
translation.fr: Non. Jusqu'à ce que je confirme votre compétence, pas de patients.

translation.en: Well, how can you confirm my competency if I can't see any patients?
translation.fr: Comment confirmer ma compétence si je ne vois pas de patients ?

translation.en: Chitchat is over. I've got a waitin' room full of people.
translation.fr: Fini de papoter. J'ai une salle d'attente pleine.

translation.en: - Welcome. - Hi.
Oh, I am sorry that my husband isn't here to greet you as well.
translation.fr: Désolée que mon mari ne soit pas là pour vous saluer.

translation.en: - Oh... - He's doing a supply run in Grace Valley.
translation.fr: Il est parti au ravitaillement à Grace Valley.

translation.en: We only have one room left, and, uh... I'm nervous that you won't like it.
translation.fr: Il ne nous reste qu'une chambre et je crains qu'elle ne vous plaise pas.

translation.en: Hope told me that you're very picky.
translation.fr: Hope m'a dit que tu vous étiez difficile.

translation.en: Yeah.
- Come take a look. - Okay.
- After you. - Thank you.
Boy, you picked the wrong place to rob.
Get your hands up.
Now turn around. Slowly.
Come on.
Hey, man.
Brady!
Bro, what are you doing in here, man?
translation.fr: Qu'est-ce que tu fais là, mec ?

translation.en: I was leaving you a note. Wanted to let you know I was okay.
translation.fr: Je te laissais un mot. Pour te dire que j'allais bien.

translation.en: How the hell did you get in here?
Come on. I know where you keep the spare key.
translation.fr: Arrête. Je sais où tu gardes la clé.

translation.en: Listen, I-- I've got plans this morning.
translation.fr: Écoute, je suis occupé ce matin.

translation.en: But why don't you go get something to eat, and then go up to my room,
translation.fr: Mais mange quelque chose, puis va dans ma chambre

translation.en: grab some sleep, and then clean yourself up, okay?
translation.fr: pour dormir et te laver, d'accord ?

translation.en: All right.
Long time.
Welcome back.
Thanks, man.
Yeah.
Hey!
Hey.
Are you coming up, or am I coming down?
translation.fr: Tu montes ou je dois descendre ?

translation.en: - You're comin' down here. - Okay.
Oh, I see you got a coffee.
translation.fr: Je vois que tu as un café.

translation.en: Yeah. Paige's bakery truck.
translation.fr: Oui. Du camion à pain de Paige.

translation.en: You could have mentioned it.
- I believe in self- discovery. - Ah.
- And practicality. - Ah!
Yeah.
- No, thank you. - No, no, no. I insist.
Where are we going?
I cleared your morning with Doc.
translation.fr: Pas de souci. J'ai libéré ta matinée avec Doc.

translation.en: You cleared my morning.
Well, there's no cell reception out here,
translation.fr: Il n'y a pas de réseau ici,

translation.en: so I figured you wouldn't want to give Doc any more ammunition by being late, so...
translation.fr: donc pour éviter de donner de l'eau au moulin de Doc avec un retard...

translation.en: - Wow. - But let me help you.
No, no. I don't need your assistance, okay?
translation.fr: Non, je n'ai pas besoin de ton aide.

translation.en: Okay. I'm sorry I called Doc for you. It won't happen again.
translation.fr: Bon. Désolé d'avoir appelé Doc pour toi. Ça n'arrivera plus.

translation.en: Now, you wanna put your hand on my shoulder?
translation.fr: Tu veux mettre ta main sur mon épaule ?

translation.en: Okay, now step.
And... other one.
Step.
Okay.
- All right. We can leave this here. - Wait.
No. No, no, no.
My whole life is in that bag.
Oh, look, no one's gonna take it.
- Hm? - Because no one's here.
- Trust me? - Hm.
Mm. Hey, thank you.
- Uh... How much further? - We're almost there.
translation.fr: - C'est encore loin ? - On y est presque.

translation.en: Wow.
It's not even the best part.
translation.fr: Ce n'est même pas le plus beau.

translation.en: Eagles.
Here.
This is their favorite spot.
Mine too.
They're incredible. Huh.
Yeah.
So, what's next?
Nothin'.
Here.
Oh, thank you.
Yeah.
I think I can actually hear my heart beating.
translation.fr: Je crois que j'entends mon cœur battre.

translation.en: In peace, nothing so becomes a man... Or woman...
translation.fr: Dans la paix, rien ne sied à un homme, ou à une femme...

translation.en: - ...as modest stillness. - Shakespeare?
- Mm. - You an English major?
No, I never went to college.
translation.fr: Non, je ne suis jamais allé à la fac.

translation.en: But in my 20s, I loved to read while drinkin',
translation.fr: Mais à 20 ans, j'adorais lire en buvant,

translation.en: so it kind of all evens out.
- Is that hunters? - Yeah, could be.
Could be somethin' else.
There's a lot of illegal pot fields outside of Virgin River.
translation.fr: Il y a beaucoup de champs illégaux de cannabis dans le coin.

translation.en: But it's legal now.
Yeah. It doesn't stop the illegal growers from doin' business.
translation.fr: Oui. Ça n'empêche pas les producteurs illégaux de continuer.

translation.en: Cross them, and things can turn dangerous.
translation.fr: Si tu les contraries, ça peut être dangeureux.

translation.en: I used to work in the, uh... ER Level One Trauma Center,
translation.fr: Je travaillais aux urgences d'un centre de traumatologie,

translation.en: so I've seen my fair share of what dangerous can do.
translation.fr: j'ai vu ma part de ce que peut faire le danger.

translation.en: ER, huh?
Sounds like an intense job.
Yeah, you could say that.
But I'm sure owning a bar has its challenges.
translation.fr: Mais je suis sûre qu'avoir un bar a ses propres défis.

translation.en: Piece of cake, compared to my time in the service.
translation.fr: C'est du gâteau comparé à l'époque de l'armée.

translation.en: Marine. Joined up right out of high school.
translation.fr: Infanterie de marine. Dès la sortie du lycée.

translation.en: Spent 20- plus years, mostly in the Middle East.
translation.fr: J'y ai passé plus de 20 ans, surtout au Moyen-Orient.

translation.en: Preacher was with me. And Brady. You haven't met him yet.
translation.fr: Preacher était avec moi. Et Brady. Tu ne l'as pas encore vu.

translation.en: Wow.
Do you miss it?
Yes and no.
I had, um...
People who... depended on me.
translation.fr: des gens qui... dépendaient de moi.

translation.en: And Virgin River, well, it's, uh...
it's a utopia, compared to a war zone.
translation.fr: c'est une utopie comparée à une zone de combat.

translation.en: - Oh, here. - Oh...
- Aah. - Thank you.
You're welcome.
Thanks for this morning.
It was my pleasure.
Well, I'll see you around.
Yeah, you will.
- See ya. - Bye.
Hello?
Doc?
Is Doc here?
Hi, there. No, no, he's not in right now.
translation.fr: Bonjour. Non, pas pour le moment.

translation.en: He'll be back soon.
I'll wait.
Uh... I'm the new nurse practitioner. Maybe I can help you.
translation.fr: Je suis la nouvelle infirmière. Je peux t'aider.

translation.en: Uh... Oh, I'll wait for Doc.
- Um... When are you due? - Ooh...
Any day now.
- - It's okay.
Okay. I think I should take a look at you.
I don't know when the doctor'll be back.
translation.fr: je ne sais pas quand le docteur va revenir.

translation.en: - Okay? - Okay.
- Okay. Can you stand? - Okay.
Uh... Yeah.
- Yeah. - It's okay. Just take a breath.
- Ready? One, two, three. Up. - Okay.
There you go.
It's okay. You're gonna be just fine.
translation.fr: Ça ira. Tout va bien se passer.

translation.en: - Okay? - Okay.
- What's your name? - Polly.
- Polly Fishburn. - Polly Fishburn.
My name's Mel.
And I'm gonna take really good care of you, okay?
translation.fr: Je vais bien m'occuper de toi, d'accord ?

translation.en: Okay.
You're gonna be just fine now. Can you get up on this table?
translation.fr: Ça va aller. Tu peux monter sur la table ?

translation.en: - Yeah.  - Got it?
- You got it. You got it. -
I've gone through last night's receipts twice.
translation.fr: J'ai vérifié deux fois les reçus d'hier soir.

translation.en: - Mm- hm? - The cash box is light.
Oh, y-- you know what?
I advanced Ricky a week to prep the McCrea cabin for some maintenance. I--
translation.fr: J'ai avancé une semaine à Ricky pour la réparation du chalet McCrea.

translation.en: I thought I logged that. Must have forgotten.
Oh, look who's back in town...
translation.fr: Mais qui est de retour en ville...

translation.en: So, how long before you disappear again? I told him he could stay as long as he wants.
translation.fr: - À quand la prochaine disparition ? - Il peut rester tant qu'il veut.

translation.en: I'm gonna head to Clear River. Run some errands. Catch you in a bit.
translation.fr: Je vais à Clear River. Faire des courses. On se voit après.

translation.en: Yeah.
Uh, I left...
a lot of kids behind who I couldn't help.
translation.fr: beaucoup de gosses que je n'ai pas pu aider.

translation.en: I can help Brady, okay? I'm not turning my back on him.
translation.fr: Je peux aider Brady. Je ne lui tournerai pas le dos.

translation.en: Well, then, you may wanna change the locks on the office door.
translation.fr: Alors tu devrais changer les serrures de la porte du bureau.

translation.en: Or you may be advancing Ricky a whole lot more than a week's pay.
translation.fr: Ou tu avanceras à Ricky bien plus qu'une semaine de salaire.

translation.en: What is goin' on?
- I'm with a patient. - No, I--
I'm almost done. I'll be right out.
Is everything okay?
You're doing fine. Your baby is doing fine, okay?
translation.fr: Tu vas bien. Ton bébé va bien, d'accord ?

translation.en: You're just having... some Braxton Hicks.
translation.fr: Ce sont juste des contractions de Braxton Hicks.

translation.en: - Oh. - False labor pains.
- - They don't feel false though, do they?
translation.fr: Mais on les sent vraiment, hein ?

translation.en: - No.  - No.
Uh... Why don't you just lay here and rest,
and I'll go call your husband to come pick you up, okay?
translation.fr: j'appelle ton mari pour qu'il vienne te chercher.

translation.en: Okay.
Thanks, Mel.
You're very welcome.
- Who said you could give her an exam? - I was just doing my job.
translation.fr: Pourquoi l'avez-vous examinée ? Je faisais mon travail.

translation.en: This is my practice. My name is on that door.
translation.fr: C'est mon cabinet. C'est mon nom sur cette porte.

translation.en: You do not work with a patient unless you have my permission.
translation.fr: Ne travaillez pas avec un patient sans ma permission.

translation.en: Polly was having Braxton Hicks.
I had to examine her to make sure that she wasn't in premature labor.
translation.fr: Je devais m'assurer que le travail n'avait pas commencé.

translation.en: Did you know there's protein in her urine?
translation.fr: Saviez-vous pour les protéines dans ses urines?

translation.en: Don't lecture me about my patient.
translation.fr: Ne me faites pas la morale.

translation.en: Well, it's not in her chart. - I don't put everything in the chart. - Uh- huh.
translation.fr: - Le dossier n'en dit rien. - Je ne mets pas tout dans le dossier.

translation.en: - Okay, well, where do you put it? - Right here.
translation.fr: - Vous le mettez où, alors ? - Ici.

translation.en: And if you're not here to tell me what's not in the chart?
translation.fr: Et si vous n'êtes pas là pour me le dire ?

translation.en: My dear, I'm not just old, I'm old- school.
translation.fr: Ma chère, je ne suis pas juste un ancien, je marche à l'ancienne.

translation.en: And in my day, a nurse would never, never question
translation.fr: De mon temps, une infirmière ne doutait jamais des méthodes

translation.en: the methods of a supervising physician.
translation.fr: De mon temps, une infirmière ne doutait jamais des méthodes d'un médecin responsable.

translation.en: A nurse would know her place.
Well, I hope you'll join me in the 21st century.
translation.fr: J'espère que vous me rejoindrez dans le 21e siècle.

translation.en: And your point is?
This time it was false labor, but what about the next Polly or whoever?
translation.fr: C'était un faux travail, mais qu'en sera-t-il la prochaine fois ?

translation.en: Wh-- Do you want me to just stand by
and watch someone bleed out if you're not here?
translation.fr: si un patient se vide de son sang ?

translation.en: You should have called me.
I had things under control.
These patients, they are like my family.
translation.fr: Ces patients sont comme ma famille.

translation.en: And I cannot trust you with them
translation.fr: Et je ne vous les confierai pas

translation.en: unless I know for sure you're not gonna hurt someone.
translation.fr: sans savoir que vous ne leur ferez pas de mal.

translation.en: So, if I can't do what I was hired to do, what is it that you want me to do?
translation.fr: Si je ne peux pas faire mon travail, que voulez-vous que je fasse ?

translation.en: Well, straighten up the office.
translation.fr: Mettez de l'ordre dans le bureau.

translation.en: File things. Uh-- Keep the coffee pot full.
translation.fr: Faites du classement. Gardez la cafetière pleine.

translation.en: I like mine black and fresh.
translation.fr: J'aime le mien frais et noir.

translation.en: Hello, Polly.
He's refusing to let me do my job.
translation.fr: Il refuse de me laisser travailler.

translation.en: - Give it time. - No, no, no, no, no.
This is not about time.
Okay, good medicine is about teamwork, and he doesn't want me on his team.
translation.fr: La médecine, c'est un travail d'équipe et il ne veut pas de moi dans son équipe.

translation.en: He'll come around.
He is rude, he is demeaning,
and he's a big- time chauvinist.
The man's got his quirks, I'll give you that.
translation.fr: Il a ses excentricités, je l'admets.

translation.en: It's obvious that he needs somebody, but it's not gonna work like this, okay?
translation.fr: Il a clairement besoin de quelqu'un, mais ça ne marchera pas comme ça.

translation.en: It needs to be his idea, or he's never gonna accept it.
translation.fr: Ce doit être son idée ou il ne l'acceptera jamais.

translation.en: My grandfather was just like him.
So, you understand.
Yeah, and he's never gonna change.
translation.fr: Oui et il ne changera jamais.

translation.en: Look, Hope, the bottom line is that this is not what I signed up for.
translation.fr: Hope, ce n'est pas pour ça que j'ai signé.

translation.en: Join the club, sweetheart.
Life rarely gives us what we want.
translation.fr: La vie nous donne rarement ce qu'on veut.

translation.en: Okay... I didn't join a club, okay? I took a job.
translation.fr: Je n'ai pas rejoint un club, d'accord ? J'ai accepté un travail.

translation.en: I'm sorry, I have to give you notice.
translation.fr: Désolée, je vous donne mon préavis.

translation.en: I'll give you time to find someone, but you need to start looking now.
translation.fr: Je vous laisse trouver quelqu'un, mais cherchez maintenant.

translation.en: She's so beautiful.
- ♪ And I saw my reflection ♪ - So, where's Bill?
- ♪ In the snow- covered hills ♪ - Work.
Auntie Mel.
- ♪ Till the landslide brought me down ♪ - You make beautiful babies.
So, when are you two gonna make me an aunt?
translation.fr: Et quand allez-vous faire de moi une tante ?

translation.en: - ♪ What is love? ♪ - We're working on it.
- ♪ Can the child ♪ - Work harder.
- ♪ Rise above? ♪ - Okay.
- You know I rarely agree with your sister. - ♪ Can I sail ♪
translation.fr: Je suis rarement d'accord avec ta sœur.

translation.en: - ♪ Ocean tides? - She's right.
- ♪ Can I handle the seasons ♪ - I have to run. Sorry.
Hey, Mel.
Jack?
- ♪ Well, maybe ♪ - You better take a look at this.
- ♪ Well, maybe ♪ - Jesus.
I'm pretty sure that's not Jesus.
translation.fr: Je ne pense pas que ce soit Jésus.
